name: BlockVigil, Inc.
description: Developer of software development program designed to develop blockchain applications. The company's software offers developer tools to build and scale blockchain applications with just a few lines of code and allows to build full-stack apps on the blockchain without learning protocol specifics, enabling users to build applications without learning specifics protocols.
one_liner: Developer of software development program designed to develop blockchain applications.
